statements: SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT asset_name, owner_address, blockchain_platform FROM digital_assets;
SELECT id, asset_name FROM digital_assets WHERE owner_address = '0x123abc';
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, token_id FROM digital_assets WHERE owner_address = '0x456def' AND blockchain_platform = 'Polygon';
SELECT id, asset_name, owner_address, blockchain_platform, token_id, trade_history FROM digital_assets WHERE owner_address='0x1234567890123456789012345678901234567890'
SELECT id, asset_name, blockchain_platform, trade_history FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_platform='Ethereum' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE token_id IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(owner_address) > 50
SELECT id, asset_name, owner_address, trade_history FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'M%' OR owner_address LIKE '%crypto%'
SELECT id, asset_name, owner_address, token_id, trade_history FROM digital_assets WHERE LENGTH(token_id) < 50 LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM asset_ownership;
SELECT asset_id, owner_address, creation_timestamp, blockchain_platform FROM asset_ownership ORDER BY creation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_trading_history WHERE trader_address='0x123456789ABCDEF';
SELECT trade_id, asset_id, trader_address, trade_timestamp FROM asset_trading_history WHERE asset_id=123;
SELECT owner_address, COUNT(*) AS total_ownership FROM asset_ownership GROUP BY owner_address ORDER BY total_ownership DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_address = '123abc' ORDER BY creation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT asset_id, owner_address, blockchain_platform FROM asset_ownership WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT asset_id, trader_address, trade_timestamp FROM asset_trading_history WHERE trader_address = '456xyz' ORDER BY trade_timestamp DESC;
SELECT asset_id, owner_address, creation_timestamp FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_address LIKE '%AB%' AND creation_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM asset_ownership INNER JOIN asset_trading_history ON asset_ownership.asset_id = asset_trading_history.asset_id WHERE asset_ownership.blockchain_platform = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE id = 1
SELECT asset_name, owner_address FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum'
SELECT owner_name, email FROM owners WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Bitcoin'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT asset_id, owner_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'sell'
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE id = 1
SELECT asset_name, owner_address FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' ORDER BY asset_name ASC
SELECT owner_name, email, blockchain_platform FROM owners WHERE blockchain_platform = 'Bitcoin' ORDER BY owner_name DESC
SELECT id, asset_id, owner_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' AND asset_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT * FROM owners INNER JOIN transactions ON owners.id = transactions.owner_id WHERE owners.blockchain_platform = 'Ethereum' AND transactions.transaction_type = 'sell'
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT digital_asset_name, owner_address, blockchain_platform FROM digital_assets;
SELECT digital_asset_name, owner_address, blockchain_platform FROM digital_assets WHERE digital_asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM asset_ownership ORDER BY ownership_start_date DESC;

SELECT digital_assets.digital_asset_name, asset_transactions.transaction_type, asset_transactions.transaction_value FROM digital_assets JOIN asset_transactions ON digital_assets.digital_asset_id = asset_transactions.digital_asset_id WHERE asset_transactions.transaction_value > 1000 ORDER BY asset_transactions.transaction_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT digital_asset_name, owner_address FROM digital_assets WHERE digital_asset_id > 100 ORDER BY digital_asset_name DESC;
SELECT digital_asset_id, owner_address, ownership_start_date FROM asset_ownership WHERE owner_address = '0x1a4fB84b4493fb0b17964aOce3f8Fbfb779fT5De';
SELECT transaction_id, digital_asset_id, transaction_type FROM asset_transactions WHERE transaction_value > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_platforms WHERE platform_description LIKE '%blockchain%' ORDER BY platform_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_owner FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_platform = 'example_platform';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_owner FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_owner ASC;
SELECT SUM(trade_amount) AS total_traded_amount FROM asset_trading_history WHERE trade_type = 'buy';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_platform, asset_owner FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_platform = 'Ethereum';
SELECT asset_name, asset_owner, asset_platform FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM asset_trading_history WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT asset_id, COUNT(*) AS trades_count FROM asset_trading_history GROUP BY asset_id ORDER BY trades_count DESC;
